Hello, ubotu server is gui: you mean Ubuntu Server? It is just a command line.  You can install the ubuntu-desktop package if you want a desktop install.
Yes.  The server uses a different kernel, doesnt come with a gui and also can install a LAMP (webserver) off the install CD.
you can: `sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop`  FYI: there are no restricted (closed) drivers for the -server kernel.
